channel.title: 718 Some desert construction rooms
channel.description:
I doubt any of you who at least have some knowledge knows how to get regions and do not need this. however i want to make the general rsps game play better.
Here you go
[code] DINING_ROOM(244, 639, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), CHAPEL(242, 637, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), THRONE_ROOM(246, 637, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), BEDROOM(246, 639, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), STAIRS_DOWN(247, 638, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), STAIRS_UP_QUEST_HALL(245, 638, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), PARLOUR(240, 639, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), WORKSHOP(240, 637, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), PORTAL_ROOM(241, 636, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST), COMBAT_RING(243, 636, false, RegionBuilder.NORTH, RegionBuilder.EAST, RegionBuilder.SOUTH, RegionBuilder.WEST); [/code]
Fidn them all and youc an let your player choose which theme they want, which i did :)

I doubt any of you who at least have some knowledge knows how to get regions and do not need this. however i want to make the general rsps game play better.
